dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.text: The amount to scale the text size rendered on the resource bars.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.enab: Whether to render a custom bar instead of hearts.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.heal: The width of the health bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The height of the health bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The width of the animated health bar, in pixels.
The height of the animated health bar, in pixels.
How much to shift the animated bar to the right relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the left health border.
How much to shift the animated bar upward relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the bottom health border.
Number of animation frames in the health bar animation.
The height of each frame in the health bar animation, in pixels.
Enable or disable an extra fancy overlay for the health bar.
How much to shift the health bar's fancy overlay to the right.
How much to shift the health bar's fancy overlay upward.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.enab: Whether to render a custom bar instead of hunger.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.stam: The width of the stamina bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The height of the stamina bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The width of the animated stamina bar, in pixels.
The height of the animated stamina bar, in pixels.
How much to shift the animated bar to the right relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the left stamina border.
How much to shift the animated bar upward relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the bottom stamina border.
Number of animation frames in the stamina bar animation.
The height of each frame in the stamina bar animation, in pixels.
Whether to render an extra fancy overlay for the stamina bar.
How much to shift the stamina bar's fancy overlay to the right.
How much to shift the stamina bar's fancy overlay upward.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.enab: Whether to render a custom bar instead of supported mods' built-in mana bars. Note: If you have no supported mana-providing mods installed, no bar will render regardless of this option.
dynamic_resource_bars.configuration.mana: The width of the mana bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The height of the mana bar's background sprite, in pixels.
The width of the animated mana bar, in pixels.
The height of the animated mana bar, in pixels.
How much to shift the animated bar to the right relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the left mana border.
How much to shift the animated bar upward relative to the border. In other words, the thickness of the bottom mana border.
Number of animation frames in the mana bar animation.
The height of each frame in the mana bar animation, in pixels.
Whether to render an extra fancy overlay for the mana bar.
Whether to render the display of mana text.
How much to shift the mana bar's fancy overlay to the right.
How much to shift the mana bar's fancy overlay upward.
